original_title: マドンナ復活専属 第3弾！！ 妻には口が裂けても言えません、義母さんを孕ませてしまったなんて…。-1泊2日の温泉旅行で、我を忘れて中出ししまくった僕。- 水野朝陽
overview: This guy has been quarreling with her wife and he has not seen any action in a while. The in-laws notice their troubles and invite them to go all together to hot springs inn.  Once there, things don’t get better with the wife, but he notices the charms of the Mother-in-law…
tagline: We Went on A 2-Day, 1-Night Hot Spring Resort Vacation Together, and I Lost My Mind Having Creampie Sex with Her.
title: She's Back and Under Exclusive Contact with the Madonna Label No.3!! I Could Never Tell My Wife What I Just Did - That I Had A Pregnancy Fetish for My Stepmom ...
